original_text: Isaac was born because of God's Spirit. The son who was born in the human way gave much trouble to Isaac at that time. You who are believers receive the same kind of trouble now. Isaac was born because of God's Spirit. The son who was born in the human way gave much trouble to Isaac at that time. You who are believers receive the same kind of trouble now.
korean_text: 그러나 그 때에 육체를 따라 난 자가 성령을 따라 난 자를 박해한 것 같이 이제도 그러하도다

sentences.original_text: Isaac was born because of God's Spirit.
The son who was born in the human way
gave much trouble to Isaac at that time.
receive the same kind of trouble now.
